name: Barony
description: Barony is a 3D, first-person roguelike that brings back the cryptic and intricate designs of classic roguelikes such as Nethack and melds them with RPGs like Ultima Underworld, System Shock, and Daggerfall. Challenge is the calling card of this hard-boiled dungeon-crawler.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 3.0 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Two button mouse is required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel i5 3.5 ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio Additional Notes: Two button mouse is required
